item.description:
WANNA GET TONED AND TIGHTENED BUT STILL HAVE FUN?

Be the first in the North of Boston area to catch the newest workout sensation from Zumba Fitness:

 

Zumba Sentao™ is here!

 

Be the first in the Boston area to catch the newest workout sensation from Zumba Fitness™: Zumba Sentao™! The Zumba Sentao™ workout takes all the fun cardio dance/fitness moves from our regular Zumba™ class and fuses them with toning, strengthening and balancing exercises performed with a chair for a "prop".

The result is a great total body workout that’ll take your fitness to another level!

Perfect for both the regular Zumba enthusiast who want something new and to compliment their regular Zumba Dance with Amy workouts or for the first-time Zumba™ student, because the program combines traditional toning moves like squats, lunges, and crunches that are done at a slower, controlled pace with easy to learn but intense and effective fat-burning cardio dance moves.

OPEN TO THE PUBLIC...JUST DROP-IN!
NO EXPERIENCE NECESSARY!

WALK-IN: $10
4 Class-Card: Only $32!
***SPECIAL LIMITED TIME FREE CLASS GIVE-AWAY***
Each person that gets a friend to buy a 4-Class Card tonight will be entered in a drawing for a FREE 4-Class Card pass! (1 entry per successful referral/4 class card bought)

*Please see https://www.facebook.com/pages/Zumba-Dance-with-Amy/339973018022 for the latest updates

group.name: The Zumba Dance and Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Introducing Zumba Sentao! The HOT new Dance/Toning Workout from Zumba Fitness!
